about_the_game:
This is a short proof-of-concept demo. Of the four main characters, you can play Pox's opening story and level, and you can play Capella's first level. It's roughly an hour long, but it should give you a good idea of the kind of game we're trying to make!

Default Controls:

A: Confirm
S: Cancel, run toggle
Space Bar: Attack (outside of battle)
Enter: Menu, toggle enemy health

content_descriptors.notes: The World of Gloom is violent and unforgiving.  Expect to see its insectoid inhabitants routinely killed, maimed, and eaten.
